mapper.sql: /*[TbMetaCmpnyTbTypD.xml][select][TANINE]*/ SELECT CMPNY_CD , SYS_CD , TB_TYP_GBCD , TB_TYP_CNTS , SUFX_CD , US_YN , CRT_DTM , CRT_ID , MDF_DTM , MDF_ID FROM TB_META_CMPNY_TB_TYP_D WHERE CMPNY_CD = #{cmpny_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SYS_CD = #{sys_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TB_TYP_GBCD = #{tb_typ_gbcd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
